languages.text: "Письмами... Однажды я получил послание без подписи — его автор уже знал о том, что мои расчеты были ошибочны. Мне предложили помощь в сокрытии моей вины... в обмен я должен был указать на то, что именно Версерианы саботировали работу путей снабжения. Мне лишь нужно было собрать вместе документы и отчетности, которые он указал в одном из писем... и молчать".

traits.locale_text: "Письмами... Однажды я получил послание без подписи — его автор уже знал о том, что мои расчеты были ошибочны и именно за них род Версериан и весь Даргонус столкнулись с логистическими проблемами. Мне предложили помощь в сокрытии моей вины... в обмен я должен был указать на то, что именно Версерианы саботировали работу путей снабжения". {n}Голос Корнелиуса дрожит, юноша явно торопится побыстрее закончить свою речь.{/n}

languages.text: "By letter. I received a letter out of the blue one day — it was unsigned, but the person writing already knew about my erroneous calculations. They offered to help me cover up my misdeed... and in return, I would name the Werserians as the ones who had sabotaged the supply lines. All I had to do was gather together some documents and reports that were listed in one of the letters... that, and keep my mouth shut."
languages.original_text: "Письмами... Однажды я получил послание без подписи — его автор уже знал о том, что мои расчеты были ошибочны. Мне предложили помощь в сокрытии моей вины... в обмен я должен был указать на то, что именно Версерианы саботировали работу путей снабжения. Мне лишь нужно было собрать вместе документы и отчетности, которые он указал в одном из писем... и молчать".

traits.locale_text: "We corresponded by letters. Once I have received an unsigned letter — its author had already known about my mistake. I had been offered the help in concealing my guilt... and in return, I had to point to the Werserians as the ones who sabotaged the supply lines. I only had to collect the documents and reports that he listed in one of the letters... and to keep silent."

"We corresponded by letters. Once I have received an unsigned letter — its author had already known about my mistake. I had been offered the help in concealing my guilt... and in return, I had to point to the Werserians as the ones who sabotaged the supply lines. I only had to collect the documents and reports that he listed in one of the letters... and to keep silent."

"We exchanged letters. Once I received an unsigned letter. Its author had already known about my miscalculations. I was offered assistance with covering up my guilt... and in return, I had to point to the Werserians as the ones who sabotaged the supply lines. I only had to collect the documents and reports that they listed in one of their letters... and to stay tight-lipped."

"We exchanged letters. Once I received an unsigned letter. Its author had already known about my miscalculations. I was offered assistance with covering up my guilt... and in return, I had to point to the Werserians as the ones who sabotaged the supply lines. I only had to collect the documents and reports that they listed in one of their letters... and to stay tight-lipped."

"By letter. I received a letter out of the blue one day — it was unsigned, but the person writing already knew about my erroneous calculations. They offered to help me cover up my misdeed... and in return, I would name the Werserians as the ones who had sabotaged the supply lines. All I had to do was gather together some documents and reports that were listed in one of the letters... that, and keep my mouth shut."

They offered to help me cover up my misdeed... and in return, I would name the Werserians as the ones who had sabotaged the supply lines. All I had to do was gather together some documents and reports that were listed in one of the letters... that, and keep my mouth shut."

languages.text: 「手紙です。ある日突然、一通の手紙を受け取ったのです。署名はありませんでしたが、その手紙の主はすでに私の誤った計算を知っていました。彼らは私の誤ちを隠蔽する手助けをしてくれると言ってきたのです…その見返りに、供給ラインを妨害したのはウェルザリアンだと指名せよ、と。私がしなければならなかったのは、手紙に記載されていたいくつかの書類と報告書を集めること…そして、口をつぐむことでした」
languages.original_text: "By letter. I received a letter out of the blue one day — it was unsigned, but the person writing already knew about my erroneous calculations. They offered to help me cover up my misdeed... and in return, I would name the Werserians as the ones who had sabotaged the supply lines. All I had to do was gather together some documents and reports that were listed in one of the letters... that, and keep my mouth shut."

traits.locale_text: 「手紙です。ある日突然、一通の手紙を受け取ったのです。署名はありませんでしたが、その手紙の主はすでに私の誤った計算を知っていました。彼らは私の誤ちを隠蔽する手助けをしてくれると言ってきたのです…その見返りに、供給ラインを妨害したのはウェルザリアンだと指名せよ、と。私がしなければならなかったのは、手紙に記載されていたいくつかの書類と報告書を集めること…そして、口をつぐむことでした」

languages.text: “我们是通过写信联络的。某天，我突然收到了一封信，尽管那封信没有署名，但写信的人已经知道了我犯下的大错。他主动提出要帮我掩盖罪行……而作为回报，我需要指证韦尔森家族是破坏供应线路的幕后黑手。我要做的事情，只要找到他在某封信里列出的文件和报告……再就是对这一切守口如瓶。”
languages.original_text: "By letter. I received a letter out of the blue one day — it was unsigned, but the person writing already knew about my erroneous calculations. They offered to help me cover up my misdeed... and in return, I would name the Werserians as the ones who had sabotaged the supply lines. All I had to do was gather together some documents and reports that were listed in one of the letters... that, and keep my mouth shut."

traits.locale_text: “我们是通过写信联络的。某天，我突然收到了一封信，尽管那封信没有署名，但写信的人已经知道了我犯下的大错。他主动提出要帮我掩盖罪行……而作为回报，我需要指证韦尔森家族是破坏供应线路的幕后黑手。我要做的事情，只要找到他在某封信里列出的文件和报告……再就是对这一切守口如瓶。”

languages.text: « Par écrit. Tout a commencé le jour où j'ai reçu une lettre anonyme. Son auteur savait tout de mon erreur de calcul. Il a proposé de me couvrir... et en échange, je devais accuser les Werserian d'avoir saboté les lignes de ravitaillement. Il m'a juste été demandé de rassembler une liste de documents et de rapports... et de garder bouche close. »
languages.original_text: "By letter. I received a letter out of the blue one day — it was unsigned, but the person writing already knew about my erroneous calculations. They offered to help me cover up my misdeed... and in return, I would name the Werserians as the ones who had sabotaged the supply lines. All I had to do was gather together some documents and reports that were listed in one of the letters... that, and keep my mouth shut."

traits.locale_text: « Par écrit. Tout a commencé le jour où j'ai reçu une lettre anonyme. Son auteur savait tout de mon erreur de calcul. Il a proposé de me couvrir... et en échange, je devais accuser les Werserian d'avoir saboté les lignes de ravitaillement. Il m'a juste été demandé de rassembler une liste de documents et de rapports... et de garder bouche close. »

languages.text: «Por carta. Recibí una por sorpresa. Aunque no estaba firmada, la persona que la había escrito sabía de mis cálculos erróneos. Se ofreció a ayudarme a encubrir mi falta... y a cambio yo nombraría a los Werserian como responsables del sabotaje de la cadena de suministros. Solo debía reunir ciertos documentos e informes que se me indicaban en la carta... y cerrar el pico».
languages.original_text: "By letter. I received a letter out of the blue one day — it was unsigned, but the person writing already knew about my erroneous calculations. They offered to help me cover up my misdeed... and in return, I would name the Werserians as the ones who had sabotaged the supply lines. All I had to do was gather together some documents and reports that were listed in one of the letters... that, and keep my mouth shut."

traits.locale_text: «Por carta. Recibí una por sorpresa. Aunque no estaba firmada, la persona que la había escrito sabía de mis cálculos erróneos. Se ofreció a ayudarme a encubrir mi falta... y a cambio yo nombraría a los Werserian como responsables del sabotaje de la cadena de suministros. Solo debía reunir ciertos documentos e informes que se me indicaban en la carta... y cerrar el pico».

languages.text: "Per Brief. Eines Tages erhielt ich plötzlich einen Brief ... er war nicht unterschrieben, aber der Absender wusste bereits von meinen fehlerhaften Berechnungen. Er bot mir an, meinen Fehler zu vertuschen ... und im Gegenzug sollte ich den Werserians die Sabotage der Versorgungslinien anlasten. Ich musste nur einige Dokumente und Berichte zusammenstellen, die in einem der Briefe aufgelistet waren ... und natürlich musste ich meinen Mund halten."
languages.original_text: "By letter. I received a letter out of the blue one day — it was unsigned, but the person writing already knew about my erroneous calculations. They offered to help me cover up my misdeed... and in return, I would name the Werserians as the ones who had sabotaged the supply lines. All I had to do was gather together some documents and reports that were listed in one of the letters... that, and keep my mouth shut."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben Briefe ausgetauscht. Einmal habe ich einen nicht signierten Brief erhalten. Der Verfasser wusste bereits von meinem Rechenfehler. Er hat angeboten, mir dabei zu helfen, ihn zu vertuschen ... und im Gegenzug musste ich die Werserians bezichtigen, die Versorgungslinien sabotiert zu haben. Ich musste nur die Dokumente und Berichte beschaffen, die dieser unbekannte Verfasser mir nannte ... und meinen Mund halten."

languages.text: "Mektupla. Günün birinde imzasız bir mektup aldım. Fakat mektubu yazan kişi hatalı hesaplarımdan haberdardı. Bu şahıs bana, yaptığım yanlışın üstünü örtmeyi teklif etti... ve karşılığında ikmal hatlarını baltalayanın Werserian Hanesi mensupları olduğunu söylememi istedi. Tek yapmam gereken, mektuplarda geçen bazı belge ve raporlara ulaşıp... çenemi kapalı tutmaktı."
languages.original_text: "By letter. I received a letter out of the blue one day — it was unsigned, but the person writing already knew about my erroneous calculations. They offered to help me cover up my misdeed... and in return, I would name the Werserians as the ones who had sabotaged the supply lines. All I had to do was gather together some documents and reports that were listed in one of the letters... that, and keep my mouth shut."

Bu şahıs bana, yaptığım yanlışın üstünü örtmeyi teklif etti... ve karşılığında ikmal hatlarını baltalayanın Werserian Hanesi mensupları olduğunu söylememi istedi. Tek yapmam gereken, mektuplarda geçen bazı belge ve raporlara ulaşıp... çenemi kapalı tutmaktı."
